title: Apple patents Magic Keyboard with integrated Mac inside to bring macOS to any display
content:
Patently Apple shows that Apple is working on an all-new computer concept. It envisions a Magic Keyboard designed with a full computer inside that can plug into any display. 

more…

The post Apple patents Magic Keyboard with integrated Mac inside to bring macOS to any display appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is working on an all-new computer concept – a Magic Keyboard designed with a full computer inside that can plug in to any display.
